title: D5 JG/Top LFT (OOL/OCS)
body:
LFT OOL/OCS 2018 Split 1 (Top/Jungle)
IGN: Imperiuš
Lots of competitive experience online and LAN. Available to compete in tournaments and scrims.
- 1st Rift Kings Online Tournament
- 2nd CyberGamer Open Ladder (2015)
- 3rd Throwdown Esports 1v1 Tournament (2017)
- 4th OCS Promotion Tournament (2016 Split 2)
- 5th-8th Cydus LAN Cafe Tournament (2016)
Working mic, flexible and willing to improve.

replies.body:
Yo, im interested
